name: Painter Paper Library
summary: Learn about .PAPERLIBRARY files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Painter is an application digital artists use for composing realistic paintings and editing photos. It provides various tools, including paintbrushes, shapes, and image effects. The app also allows you to apply paper textures (included in PAPERLIBRARY files) onto tools, like brushes, to adjust their appearance.
You can view a library of paper textures through the "Papers" panel in Painter. To access the papers, select Window → Media Panels → Papers.
NOTE: Corel replaced the .PAPERS format with the PAPERLIBRARY format.

instructions: You can open a PAPERLIBRARY file with Corel Painter. For example, to import a PAPERLIBRARY file, select Window → Media Panels → Papers, click the "Manage Libraries" icon, then select Import Paper Library.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
